DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether electrical stimulation effective expression VEGF , VEGFR-2 , HIF-1α NO heal diabetic foot ulcer .
DOC.brief_title: Electrical Stimulation Expression VEGF , VEGFR-2 , HIF NO Diabetic Foot Ulcer
DOC.detailed_description: 30 type 2 diabetic patient ischemic foot ulceration enrol . Patients randomly assign electrical stimulation ( ES , n=15 ) sham ES ( placebo , n=15 ) group . ES group receive cathodal direct current 1 h/day , 3 days/week , 4 week ( 12 session ) . Wound fluid sample collect VEGF , VEGFR-2 , HIF-1α NO measurement first last treatment session intervention . Wound surface area ( WSA ) measure 1st , 6th , 12th session .
DOC.criteria: Ischemic diabetic foot ulcer Wagner classification DFU 2 0.5 < ABI < 0.9 Mild moderate diabetic neuropathy Fracture low limb A severe infection A malignancy Kidney failure Skin diseases Osteomyelitis Pregnancy
